title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 649.16 - Material incorporated by reference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 649.16 - Material incorporated by reference

State Regulations
(a) The following documents referenced in
this Part are available for review and copying at the New York State

Environmental Facilities Corporation, 625 Broadway, Albany, New York
12207-2997. (1)

Federal Water Pollution

Control Act, also known as the Clean Water Act, 33 USC
1251
et seq., December 22, 2022. (2)

Title 40 Code of Federal Regulations
(CFR), part 35, section 2005. (3)

Chapter 75, title 31, United States Code (31 USC section
7501
et seq. enacted by Public Law
98-502, the Single Audit Act of 1984), as it may be amended. (4)

Title 40 of the CFR, part 35, subpart K
(sections 35.3100 through 35.3170 and Appendix A) as amended and
revised. (5)

Title 21 of the

Official Compilation of Codes Rules and Regulations of the State of New York, Part 2602. (b) All

United States publications referenced above are available from the

Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, DC
20402. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§
649.16

Amended

New

York State Register April 2, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 13, eff. 4/2/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. (a) The following documents referenced in this Part are available for review and copying at the New York

State

Environmental Facilities

Corporation, 625 Broadway, Albany, New York 12207-2997. (1)

Federal Water

Pollution

Control

Act, also known as the Clean Water

Act, 33 USC
1251
et seq., as amended from time to time. (2)

Title 40 Code of Federal

Regulations
(CFR), part 35, section 2005. (3)

Chapter 75, title 31, United States Code (31 USC section
7501
et seq. enacted by Public Law
98-502, the Single Audit

Act
of 1984), as it may be amended. (4)

Title 40 of the CFR, part 35, subpart K (sections 35.3100 through 35.3170 and Appendix A) as amended and revised. (5)

Title 21 of the Official Compilation of Codes Rules and

Regulations
of the

State
of New York, Part 2602. (b) All United States publications referenced above are available from the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, DC 20402. Notes
